jump_scares.spoiler: The title screen suddenly appears accompanied by a scream
An ornament shatters
The walkie talkie makes a screeching noise
After Tony shines the torch around and says “hello”, several birds suddenly fly away
Accompanied by a sound effect, Tony shines the torch down a hallway and sees a girl in the distance
There is a loud bang on the door
A hand appears in the bottom right corner of the screen
As Tony approaches the door there is a loud bang
The door slams shut behind Tony
As Tony struggles with his torch, a ghoulish girl who is missing an eye appears in front of him
Professor Goodman sees movement from the upstairs room and as he pulls back Simon is standing right behind him
Simon hits a figure with his car as he talks on the phone
There is a loud bang on Simon’s car
Simon leans back to reveal a figure at the driver’s side window
Accompanied by a sound effect, Goodman sees a ghostly image of himself inside the car
As Priddle approaches the baby crib, the towels behind him are suddenly flung into the air
The hooded figure in the distance suddenly appears directly in front of Goodman
There is the sound of glass breaking somewhere in the house
The ghoulish Maria suddenly races towards Priddle
The hooded figure suddenly jumps out of the crib behind Goodman
A bird flies into the window
